Name: Lisa Janna Black
Description:
Lisa was hit 20 times with a hammer by her roommate Synthia Kavanagh. Kavanaugh (who is also a trans woman) also stuck a knife into one of Black's eyes. Brian Inch was also reported as beating and stabbing Black.

Brian Inch was sentenced to seven years in prison after pleading guilty to manslaughter. Synthia Kavanagh was given a life sentence in this crime, and was sentenced to Kent Institution, a maximum-security, men’s prison in British Columbia.

Note that some sources list Lisa's full name was Lisa Janet Black.
